title: Question 15
description: What is Yield Farming in the BarnBridge ecosystem?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The Yield Farming staking contract is the first mechanism delivering initial $BOND token distribution to the community. This contract holds 8% of the total supply and will be distributed to community members who stake DAI, USDC, & sUSD. 

Tokens to be distributed: 800,000 $BOND. 
Program duration: 25 weeks. 
Start date: Oct 19th, 2020.
